All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
CustomControllerAdvice
This controller intercepts generic API exceptions not caught by controllers corresponding to particular entities.
CustomMongoAutoConfiguration
This is a configuration class (concerns Mongo profile).
CustomMongoDataAutoConfiguration
This is a configuration class (concerns Mongo profile).
DateFormatter
This class offers the functionality of a global DateTime Formatter.
ErrorMessage
This class is a data transfer object representing an Error Message.
ErrorMessages
This enumeration contains identifiers of generic error codes addressed to API clients.
InitDB
 
JpaAuditingConfiguration
This is a configuration class (concerns JPA profiles).
Location
This class defines the data model of Locations (Geographical or Virtual ones) for persistence in a MongoDB.
Location.GeoLocation
This inner class defines the data model of Geographical Locations for persistence in a MongoDB.
LocationConverters
This auxiliary interface defines transformations among MongoDb Location database entities and data transfer objects.
LocationConvertersImpl
This auxiliary class performs transformations among MongoDb Location database entities and data transfer objects.
LocationErrorMessages
This enumeration contains Response Codes to be used in Response Wrappers for Locations.
LocationRequestDto
This class is a data transfer object representing Locations (Geographical or Virtual ones).
LocationRequestDto.GeoLocationRequestDto
This inner class is a data transfer object for Geographical Locations.
LocationResponseDto
This class is a data transfer object representing Locations (Geographical or Virtual ones).
LocationResponseDto.GeoLocationResponseDto
This inner class is a data transfer object for Geographical Locations.
LocationResponseWrapper
 
LocationValidator
This class implements methods to validate whether an incoming HTTP Request body contains attributes that are valid according to the business rules for a Location entity.
ModelRepositoryServerApplication
This is the entrance point to the execution of the Spring Boot Project.
NonUuidArgumentException
This class defines an Exception to denote that a method's input parameter does not adhere as intended to the UUID format.
PaginationInfo
This class is auxiliary and contains pagination information to accompany lists returned in ResponseWrappers.
RequestDto
This class is a data transfer object used as body in incoming HTTP requests (POST and UPDATE).
ResponseCode
This enumeration contains Response Codes to be used in Response Wrappers.
ResponseWrapper
This class wraps the responses travelling from the persistence layer back to the API for a more complete reporting of problems / unsuccessful requests.
SuccessOrFailure
This enumeration contains a result indicator to be returned from functions denoting Success or Failure.
SwaggerConfig
This class contains configurations for the Swagger auto-generated documentation.
System
This class defines the data model of IoT Systems for persistence in a MongoDB.
SystemApiServices
This interface defines the services offered by the API layer pertaining to IoT Systems.
SystemApiServicesImpl
This class implements the services offered by the API layer pertaining to IoT Systems.
SystemController
This class intercepts API HTTP Requests pertaining to IoT Systems.
SystemConverters
This auxiliary interface defines transformations among MongoDb System database entities and data transfer objects.
SystemConvertersImpl
This auxiliary class performs transformations among MongoDb Location database entities and data transfer objects.
SystemErrorMessages
This enumeration contains Response Codes to be used in Response Wrappers for IoT Systems.
SystemJpaDaos
 
SystemListener
This class automatically reports database transactions pertaining to IoT Systems (for MongoDB).
SystemMongoDaos
This class redirects enquires to the persistence layer pertaining to IoT Systems.
SystemMongoDbDao
This interface defines the entry points (Data Access Objects) to the services offered by Mongo databases pertaining to the persistence of IoT Systems.
SystemMongoDbDaoImpl
This class implements the entry points (Data Access Objects) to the services offered by Mongo databases pertaining to the persistence of IoT Systems.
SystemPersistenceLayerDaos
This interface defines the services offered by the persistence layer pertaining to IoT Systems.
SystemPersistenceServicesDao
This interface defines the services offered that pertain to persistence (CRUD) operations of IoT Systems.
SystemPersistenceServicesDaoImpl
This class redirects enquires to the persistence layer pertaining to IoT Systems.
SystemRepository
This class is the bridge between MongoDb and the Spring Framework application as far as System transactions are concerned.
SystemRequestDto
This class is a data transfer object representing IoT Systems.
SystemResponseDto
This class is a data transfer object representing IoT Systems.
SystemResponsesWrapper
This class wraps the responses travelling from the persistence layer back to the API for a more complete reporting of problems / unsuccessful requests on IoT Systems.
SystemResponseWrapper
This class wraps the responses travelling from the persistence layer back to the API for a more complete reporting of problems / unsuccessful requests on IoT Systems.
SystemServices
This interface defines the services offered by Mongo databases pertaining to the persistence of IoT Systems.
SystemServicesImpl
This class implements the services offered by Mongo databases pertaining to the persistence of IoT Systems.
SystemValidator
This class implements methods to validate whether an incoming HTTP Request body contains attributes that are valid according to the business rules for a System entity.
Validator
This interface defines methods to validate whether an incoming HTTP Request body contains attributes that are valid according to the business rules.
ValidatorUUID
This class offers the functionality of a global tool that checks whether strings adhere to the UUID format.
